title: Discovering electronic music (TEFC)
creator_credit: Bernard Wilets and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: Shows something of the physical basis of music and how it can be created and altered by electronic means. Demonstrates the sound synthesizer and its capacity to create, envelop and filter sound. Shows computer controlled music and a composition being created through the use of a computer.
